super("The given index is out of bound.\n"
+ "so input an index between 1 and " + sizeOfStorage + " inclusive.");
* An exception indicates that the command given by the user is invalid.
super("Please enter a valid one starting with: list / mark / unmark / todo / deadline / event.");
* An exception indicates that a date given by the user has an invalid format.
super("Invalid format of date! The format has to be yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm.");
* An exception indicates that some necessary arguments are missing
super("Some arguments (/by, /from, /to, or the index of task) are missing!!");
